name: CFSocketSignature
desc: A structure that fully specifies the communication protocol and connection address of a CFSocket object.

items.name: init(protocolFamily: Int32, socketType: Int32, protocol: Int32, address: Unmanaged<CFData>!)
var address: Unmanaged<CFData>!
items.desc: A CFData object holding the contents of a struct sockaddr appropriate for the given protocol family (struct sockaddr_in or struct sockaddr_in6, for example), identifying the address of the socket.

items.name: var `protocol`: Int32
items.desc: The protocol type of the socket.

items.name: var protocolFamily: Int32
items.desc: The protocol family of the socket.

items.name: var socketType: Int32
items.desc: The socket type of the socket.
